author: Axios
title: Bernie Sanders suspends presidential campaign
description: Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday that he is suspending his presidential campaign. The big picture: It's an end to the campaign of the leading progressive in the race — and the candidate who seemed to be the clear front-runner for the Democratic nominat…
content:
Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday that he is suspending his presidential campaign.
